DOC.brief_summary: Bicortical screw widely use mandibular osteosynthesis orthognathic surgery.Transoral placement bicortical screw rigid fixation method orthognathic surgery , less often use . The aim study compare postoperative outcome transoral versus transbuccal bicortical screw placement orthognathic surgery . This study comprise academic , retrospective , monocentric study chart orthognathic patient operate January 2010 December 2012 retrospectively review . Postoperative complication register . Demographic , dental surgical parameter examine potential risk factor occurence postoperative complication .
